Thanks and credits

Thanks to all that developed ideas for move emulation: the first emulation was based on Howard Hinnant emulation code for unique_ptr, David Abrahams suggested the use of class rv class, and Klaus Triendl discovered how to bind const rlvalues using class rv.

Many thanks to all boosters that have tested and improved the library.
